EmailTemplate.name: 05_29_2015 Ticker.Newsletter
EmailTemplate.subject: The Turboticker: VMWorld Giveaway, OpenStack And The Green Data Center
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Cloud & Virtualization Lessons You’ll Love Take control of your cloud and virtual environments <http://vmturbo.com/vmturbo-vmworld-sweepstakes?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=TurbotickerMay&utm_content=05292015> The VMTurbo VMworld 2015 Sweepstakes VMTurbo is giving 3 lucky winners two Full Conference Passes to VMworld 2015 in San Francisco, the epicenter of all things virtual. One lucky winner already got their passes, will you be next? Enter Here... <http://vmturbo.com/vmturbo-vmworld-sweepstakes?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=TurbotickerMay&utm_content=05292015>
<http://vmturbo.com/solutions/use-cases/openstack?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=TurbotickerMay&utm_content=05292015> OpenStack For Enterprise: The Tipping Point Cometh! Get your copy of one of our most popular e-Books and learn:
- A brief history of OpenStack - OpenStack releases, programs and their roles - How some of the biggest companies are adopting and using OpenStack - And much more…
Get Your Copy Here... <http://vmturbo.com/solutions/use-cases/openstack?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=TurbotickerMay&utm_content=05292015>
<http://vmturbo.com/vmturbo-resources/webinar-openstack-primetime-the-state-of-open-clouds-2015?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=TurbotickerMay&utm_content=05292015> The State of OpenStack 2015 Webinar If reading isn't your thing then fear not, we've got you covered. Join Eric Wright and Kenneth Hui as they discuss the OpenStack Summit, and how OpenStack and open source ecosystems are becoming a powerful part of today's enterprise environments in this free webinar. Watch Here... <http://vmturbo.com/vmturbo-resources/webinar-openstack-primetime-the-state-of-open-clouds-2015?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=TurbotickerMay&utm_content=05292015> <http://vmturbo.com/earthday?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=TurbotickerMay&utm_content=05292015> How Green is Your Data Center? It’s no secret: data centers are consuming more energy than ever before. In fact, they are the fastest-growing consumers of electricity in the United States. Check out our latest e-Book and learn:
- The role the modern datacenter plays in worldwide electricity consumption. - Why utilizing your infrastructure as efficiently as possible is so important. - How increasing server utilization is key to reducing data center energy consumption and global business costs.
Get Your Copy Here... <http://vmturbo.com/earthday?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=TurbotickerMay&utm_content=05292015>
